meanings.definition: A blog that is updated using a mobile device.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys reading moblogs on her phone during her commute.
meanings.sent2: Many people prefer moblogs because they can be updated on the go.
meanings.sent3: The moblogs about travel adventures always make me want to pack my bags.
meanings.sent4: Her moblogs are like little windows into her daily life.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pictures on her moblogs bring the stories to life.

meanings.definition: The act of updating a blog using a mobile device.
meanings.sent1: His moblogs are filled with interesting photos he takes on his phone.
meanings.sent2: Moblogs have made it easier for people to share their experiences instantly.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally posted my grocery list on my moblogs instead of my actual blog!
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced across the screen as she updated her moblogs with the latest news.
meanings.sent5: The speed at which she updates her moblogs is truly impressive.
